name: Search_Flights_Multi_Stops

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

legs.description:

The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

response_summary:
There are currently 925 flight options available for your travel plans, with prices starting as low as $92.13 USD. The cheapest flight is priced at $92.13, while the fastest option costs $113.90, and the best overall deal is $96.79. 

Most flights are operated by IndiGo, which has 637 options with fares starting at $92.13, followed by Air India with 613 flights starting at $102.90, and Air India Express offering 13 flights from $199.75. 

The flights vary in terms of stops: there are 225 non-stop options with the lowest price at $96.79, 875 one-stop flights starting at $92.13, and all 925 options include two-stop flights also beginning at $92.13. 

Baggage policies are included, with most flights offering cabin baggage (924 options) and checked baggage (550 options). The flights cover a wide range of departure and arrival times, with the earliest departures around midnight and the latest around 11:45 PM. 

For those interested in flexible tickets, there's an option available for an additional $13.55. The flights are primarily round-trip options between Mumbai and Ahmedabad, with durations ranging from 2 to 27 hours. 

You can find more details about baggage policies on the respective airline websites: IndiGo, Air India, and Air India Express. The search results are currently not eligible for price alerts, but you can check back for updates.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning multi-stop flights. It searches flight options based on specified legs (origin, destination, and date), with sorting by best, cheapest, or fastest options. Users can filter by cabin class and passenger details (adults/children). The response includes comprehensive flight details like pricing, airline options, stopovers, baggage policies, and flexible ticket availability. Legs must be provided in an array format.

enhanced_parameters.legs: Array of flight segments with origin, destination, and date for each leg.
enhanced_parameters.pageNo: Pagination number to navigate through flight results.
enhanced_parameters.adults: Number of adult passengers (18+ years) for the flight booking.
enhanced_parameters.children: Comma-separated ages of child passengers (under 18 years).
enhanced_parameters.sort: Sorts flights by best overall, cheapest price, or fastest duration.
enhanced_parameters.cabinClass: Filters flights by cabin class (economy, premium, business, first).
enhanced_parameters.currency_code: Currency for displaying flight prices and fees.

isPOSMismatch.description: Indicates whether there is a mismatch between the detected point of sale and the user's actual location or preferences.

offerSalesCountry.description: The country where the flight offers are being sold, which may affect pricing and availability.

id.description: A unique identifier for the sub-item.

title.description: A human-readable title for the sub-item, e.g., 'Flight fare'.

price.description: The price details for the sub-item, including currency, units, and nanos.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the price is displayed, e.g., USD.

units.description: The whole number part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price, represented in nanoseconds for precision.

items.description: An empty array indicating no further nested items.

addedItems.description: An empty array indicating no additional items are included in the booking.

token.description: A unique token representing the current search session or query, used for subsequent API calls or tracking purposes.

priceDisplayRequirements.description: An array that may contain specific requirements or conditions for displaying prices, currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: Individual requirement or condition for price display.

pointOfSale.description: Indicates the geographical or market location where the search or booking is being made from, in this case 'us' for the United States.

tripType.description: Specifies the type of trip being searched for, here 'ROUNDTRIP' indicating a round-trip journey.

appliedDiscounts.description: An array that would list any discounts applied to the search results, currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: An object representing a discount applied to the flight options.

offerKeyToHighlight.description: A unique identifier for a specific flight offer that is highlighted or recommended, possibly based on best price, fastest, or other criteria.

extraProductDisplayRequirements.description: An object that may contain additional requirements or conditions for displaying extra products or services, currently empty in this response.

key.description: Identifier for the type of flight offer, e.g., 'CHEAPEST' indicating the cheapest flight option available.

offerToken.description: A unique token representing the flight offer, typically used for booking or further queries.

price.description: Detailed breakdown of the flight price including currency and amount.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the price is displayed, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: The whole number part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price, represented in nanoseconds for precision.

priceRounded.description: Rounded version of the flight price for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the rounded price is displayed, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: The whole number part of the rounded price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the rounded price, typically zero.

travellerPrices.description: List of price breakdowns for each type of traveller (e.g., adult, child).

ar_items.description: Price details specific to a traveller type.

travellerPriceBreakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of the price components for the traveller.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the total price.

units.description: Whole number part of the total price.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the total price.

baseFare.description: Base fare component of the total price.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the base fare.

units.description: Whole number part of the base fare.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the base fare.

fee.description: Additional fees included in the total price.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the fee.

units.description: Whole number part of the fee.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the fee.

tax.description: Tax component of the total price.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the tax.

units.description: Whole number part of the tax.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the tax.

totalRounded.description: Rounded total price for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the rounded total price.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the rounded total price, typically zero.

units.description: Whole number part of the rounded total price.

discount.description: Discount applied to the total price.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the discount.

units.description: Whole number part of the discount.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the discount.

totalWithoutDiscount.description: Total price before any discounts are applied.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the total price without discount.

units.description: Whole number part of the total price without discount.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the total price without discount.

totalWithoutDiscountRounded.description: Rounded total price before any discounts are applied, for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the rounded total price without discount.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the rounded total price without discount, typically zero.

units.description: Whole number part of the rounded total price without discount.

travellerReference.description: Reference identifier for the traveller, e.g., '1'.

brandedFaresShownByDefault.description: Indicates whether branded fares are displayed by default in the search results.

directFlightsOnlyFilterIgnored.description: Specifies if the filter for direct flights only was ignored in the search query.

hideFlexiblePricesBanner.description: Determines whether the banner displaying flexible pricing options is hidden.

cabinClass.description: The class of the cabin for the flight options, indicating the type of seating and service level. In this case, it is 'ECONOMY'.

code.description: The airline's IATA code, a two-character identifier for the airline (e.g., '6E' for IndiGo).

name.description: The full name of the airline (e.g., 'IndiGo').

url.description: A URL linking to the airline's baggage policy page for further details.

isEligible.description: Indicates whether the current search results are eligible for certain features or actions (e.g., price alerts).

isSearchEligible.description: Indicates whether the search itself is eligible for certain functionalities or restrictions.

isBlockoutEligible.description: Indicates whether the search results are eligible for blockout periods or restrictions (e.g., blackout dates for promotions).

atolProtectedStatus.description: Indicates the ATOL protection status of the flight options. 'NONE' means no ATOL protection is available for these flights.

searchId.description: A unique identifier for the search query, used to reference or retrieve the same search results later.

banners.description: An array that would typically contain promotional or informational banners related to the search results. Currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: Expected to contain banner information, but no items are present in this response.

isOffersCabinClassExtended.description: Indicates whether the search results include extended cabin class options. 'false' means no extended cabin class options are available.

cabinClassExtension.description: An object that would contain details about extended cabin class options if any were available. Currently empty in this response.
